sentences.english: The mochi-making assembly is an annual tradition of the Yamaguchi-gumi.
sentences.chinese: 搗麻糬大會是山口組每年的慣例。

sentences.english: I have to choose a convention.
sentences.chinese: 方向應該根據慣例來選取。

sentences.english: The convention is that a strip's first triangle defines its winding.
sentences.chinese: 按慣例，由三角形帶中的第一個三角形定義其環繞。

sentences.english: The condition of the people was one of local self-sufficiency, and local customs displaced formal law.
sentences.chinese: 人們自給自足地生活，用地方慣例代替正規法律。

sentences.english: Is it customary for guests at hotels in your country to tip the waiters?
sentences.chinese: 在貴國住旅館的客人依慣例是否給侍者小費。

sentences.english: A cab was provided for driver and fireman, as in normal railway practice .
sentences.chinese: 按通常的鐵路慣例，機車備有司機和司爐室。

sentences.english: That means well-known names and obedience to genre conventions.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着清楚明白的名稱和遵從流派慣例。

sentences.english: Before entering their rooms, they still did the routine work and drew the lot.
sentences.chinese: 進入房間前，他們又按慣例抓鬮配對。

sentences.english: These working parties will be going over well-trodden ground.
sentences.chinese: 這些工作組將按慣例工作。

sentences.english: Republicans have the right to filibuster under centuries-old rules that this page has long defended.
sentences.chinese: 長久以來的慣例是，共和黨人有阻撓議案通過的權利。

sentences.english: They are based on custom and are subject to change as new developments arise.
sentences.chinese: 會計慣例是基於習慣，並隨着新發展的出現而心跡。

sentences.english: It is the custom of this academy to make an annual award for outstanding researchers in chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 每年向傑出的化學研究人員發獎是這個學會的慣例。

sentences.english: The United States is also witnessing new levels of anxiety about Chinese business practices. The Republican frontrunner, Mitt Romney, made a stunningly tough statement about China recently
sentences.chinese: 美國也對中國的商業慣例有了新一層的擔憂。

sentences.english: In accordance with international trade practices, the consequences should be borne by the buyer.
sentences.chinese: 遵循國際貿易慣例，後果應由進購方承擔。

sentences.english: I thought I'd begin today-this is, by the way, the regular practice.
sentences.chinese: 現在開始上課，順便說一句，這是慣例。

sentences.english: It breaks rules and conventions and is impossible to pigeonhole.
sentences.chinese: 它打破規則和慣例，是不可能扣壓。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
in turn/successively/one after the other/bit by bit
